api_list.name: list channels metadata
api_list.description: this endpoint will return all the metadata of the whatsapp channels that you own. Channels that you're following are not included.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-channel.p.rapidapi.com/chlist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-channel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: enrol
api_list.description: This endpoint will respond with a QR code that you need to scan to link your instance to a WhatsApp number. **Switch the browser to a light background, so that the QR can be read correctly.**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-channel.p.rapidapi.com/enrol"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-channel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: generate instance
api_list.description: this endpoint is used right after you subscribe to provision a whatsapp instance.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-channel.p.rapidapi.com/newslot"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-channel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: instance status
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to check if your instance is created.

api_list.name: unenrol
api_list.description: use this endpoint if you want to unenrol the current number.
api_list.code:

url = "https://whatsapp-channel.p.rapidapi.com/unenrol"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-channel.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
